mapper.select: select oi.id, g.id as wares_id, g.name as good_name, g.first_drawing as good_first_drawing, g.unit as good_unit, oi.num, oi.price , oi.evaluation from bu_member_order_item oi inner join bu_wares g on oi.wares_id = g.id where oi.order_id = #{orderId}
select count(1) from bu_member_order_item oi inner join bu_member_order o on oi.order_id = o.id where 1 = 1 and o.status = 4 and oi.evaluation = false and oi.member_id = #{memberId}

select oi.id, g.id as wares_id, g.name as good_name, g.first_drawing as good_first_drawing, g.unit as good_unit, oi.order_id , oi.num, oi.price , oi.evaluation ,oi.create_time from bu_member_order_item oi inner join bu_wares g on oi.wares_id = g.id inner join bu_member_order o on oi.order_id = o.id where 1=1 and oi.member_id = #{memberId} and o.status = 4 and evaluation = false
